1: שׁוֹטְט֞וּ <sup>7751 </sup> <n>Run ye to and fro</n> בְּחוּצ֣וֹת <sup>2351 </sup> <n>through the streets</n> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>of Jerusalem</n> וּרְאוּ־ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and see</n> נָ֤א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>now</n> וּדְעוּ֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>now and know</n> וּבַקְשׁ֣וּ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>and seek</n> בִרְחוֹבוֹתֶ֔יהָ <sup>7339 </sup> <n>in the broad places</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> תִּמְצְא֣וּ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>thereof if ye can find</n> אִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>a man</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> יֵ֛שׁ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>if there be</n> עֹשֶׂ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[any] that executeth</n> מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>judgment</n> מְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>that seeketh</n> אֱמוּנָ֑ה <sup>530 </sup> <n>the truth</n> וְאֶסְלַ֖ח <sup>5545 </sup> <n>and I will pardon</n> לָֽהּ׃
2: וְאִ֥ם <sup>518 </sup> <n>and although</n> חַי־ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>liveth</n> יְהֹוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> יֹאמֵ֑רוּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And though they say</n> לָכֵ֥ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> לַשֶּׁ֖קֶר <sup>8267 </sup> <n>falsely</n> יִשָּׁבֵֽעוּ׃ <sup>7650 </sup> <n>surely they swear</n>
3: יְהֹוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> עֵינֶיךָ֮ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>[are] not thine eyes</n> הֲל֣וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> לֶאֱמוּנָה֒ <sup>530 </sup> <n>faithfulness</n> הִכִּ֤יתָה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>beat</n> אֹתָם֙ <sup>853 </sup> וְֽלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> חָ֔לוּ <sup>2342 </sup> <n>them but they have not grieved</n> כִּלִּיתָ֕ם <sup>3615 </sup> <n>thou hast consumed</n> מֵאֲנ֖וּ <sup>3985 </sup> <n>them [but] they have refused</n> קַ֣חַת <sup>3947 </sup> <n>to receive</n> מוּסָ֑ר <sup>4148 </sup> <n>correction</n> חִזְּק֤וּ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>harder</n> פְנֵיהֶם֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>they have made their faces</n> מִסֶּ֔לַע <sup>5553 </sup> <n>than a rock</n> מֵאֲנ֖וּ <sup>3985 </sup> <n>they have refused</n> לָשֽׁוּב׃ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>to return</n>
4: וַאֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אָמַ֔רְתִּי <sup>559 </sup> <n>Therefore I said</n> אַךְ־ <sup>389 </sup> <n>are only</n> דַּלִּ֖ים <sup>1800 </sup> <n>Surely these [are] poor</n> הֵ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>They</n> נוֹאֲל֕וּ <sup>2973 </sup> <n>they are foolish</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָדְעוּ֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>for they know</n> דֶּ֣רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>not the way</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> מִשְׁפַּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>[nor] the judgment</n> אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of their God</n>
5: אֵֽלֲכָה־ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>will go</n> לִּ֤י אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַגְּדֹלִים֙ <sup>1419 </sup> <n>me unto the great men</n> וַאֲדַבְּרָ֣ה <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and will speak</n> אוֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הֵ֗מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>they</n> יָדְעוּ֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>unto them for they have known</n> דֶּ֣רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>the way</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> מִשְׁפַּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>[and] the judgment</n> אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>of their God</n> אַ֣ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>also</n> הֵ֤מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>with</n> יַחְדָּו֙ <sup>3162 </sup> <n>but these have altogether</n> שָׁ֣בְרוּ <sup>7665 </sup> <n>broken</n> עֹ֔ל <sup>5923 </sup> <n>the yoke</n> נִתְּק֖וּ <sup>5423 </sup> <n>[and] burst</n> מוֹסֵרֽוֹת׃ <sup>4147 </sup> <n>the bonds</n>
6: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּן֩ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> הִכָּ֨ם <sup>5221 </sup> <n>shall slay</n> אַרְיֵ֜ה <sup>738 </sup> <n>Wherefore a lion</n> מִיַּ֗עַר <sup>3293 </sup> <n>out of the forest</n> זְאֵ֤ב <sup>2061 </sup> <n>them [and] a wolf</n> עֲרָבוֹת֙ <sup>6160 </sup> <n>of the evenings</n> יְשָׁדְדֵ֔ם <sup>7703 </sup> <n>shall spoil</n> נָמֵ֤ר <sup>5246 </sup> <n>them a leopard</n> שֹׁקֵד֙ <sup>8245 </sup> <n>shall watch</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> עָ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>5892 </sup> <n>over their cities</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>Everyone</n> הַיּוֹצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>every one that goeth out</n> מֵהֵ֖נָּה <sup>2007 </sup> <n>thence shall</n> יִטָּרֵ֑ף <sup>2963 </sup> <n>be torn in pieces</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> רַבּוּ֙ <sup>7231 </sup> <n>are many</n> פִּשְׁעֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>6588 </sup> <n>because their transgressions</n> עָצְמ֖וּ <sup>6105 </sup> <n>are increased</n> [מְשֻׁבֹותֵיהֶם כ] (מְשׁוּבֹותֵיהֶֽם <sup>4878 </sup> <n>backsliding</n> ק)
7: אֵ֤י <sup>335 </sup> <n>How</n> לָזֹאת֙ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> [אֶסְלֹוחַ־ כ] (אֶֽסְלַֽח־ <sup>5545 </sup> <n>pardon</n> לָ֔ךְ <sup>5545 </sup> <n>shall I pardon</n> ק) בָּנַ֣יִךְ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>your sons</n> עֲזָב֔וּנִי <sup>5800 </sup> <n>have forsaken</n> וַיִּשָּׁבְע֖וּ <sup>7650 </sup> <n>me and sworn</n> בְּלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>by [them that are] no</n> אֱלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>gods</n> וָאַשְׂבִּ֤עַ <sup>7650 </sup> <n>when I had fed them to the full</n> אוֹתָם֙ <sup>853 </sup> וַיִּנְאָ֔פוּ <sup>5003 </sup> <n>they then committed adultery</n> וּבֵ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>houses</n> זוֹנָ֖ה <sup>2181 </sup> <n>in the harlots'</n> יִתְגֹּדָֽדוּ׃ <sup>1413 </sup> <n>and assembled themselves by troops</n>
8: סוּסִ֥ים <sup>5483 </sup> <n>horses</n> מְיֻזָּנִ֖ים <sup>2109 </sup> <n>They were [as] fed</n> מַשְׁכִּ֣ים <sup>7904 </sup> <n>in the morning</n> הָי֑וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אִ֛ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every one</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>after</n> אֵ֥שֶׁת <sup>802 </sup> <n>wife</n> רֵעֵ֖הוּ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>after his neighbour's</n> יִצְהָֽלוּ׃ <sup>6670 </sup> <n>neighed</n>
9: הַֽעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אֵ֥לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> לוֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֶפְקֹ֖ד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>Shall I not visit</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>for these [things]? saith</n> יְהֹוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְאִם֙ <sup>518 </sup> <n>and on</n> בְּג֣וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>on such a nation</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>such</n> כָּזֶ֔ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִתְנַקֵּ֖ם <sup>5358 </sup> <n>be avenged</n> נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and shall not my soul</n> ס
10: עֲל֤וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>Go ye up</n> בְשָׁרוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <sup>8284 </sup> <n>upon her walls</n> וְשַׁחֵ֔תוּ <sup>7843 </sup> <n>and destroy</n> וְכָלָ֖ה <sup>3617 </sup> <n>not a full end</n> אַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>but make</n> הָסִ֙ירוּ֙ <sup>5493 </sup> <n>take away</n> נְטִ֣ישׁוֹתֶ֔יהָ <sup>5189 </sup> <n>her battlements</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ל֥וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> לַיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for they [are] not the LORD'S</n> הֵֽמָּה׃ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n>
11: כִּי֩ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בָג֨וֹד <sup>898 </sup> <n>have dealt very</n> בָּגְד֜וּ <sup>898 </sup> <n>treacherously</n> בִּ֗י בֵּ֧ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>For the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וּבֵ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and the house</n> יְהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>against me saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
12: כִּֽחֲשׁוּ֙ <sup>3584 </sup> <n>They have belied</n> בַּיהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> ה֑וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> תָב֤וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> רָעָ֔ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>[It is] not he neither shall evil</n> וְחֶ֥רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>sword</n> וְרָעָ֖ב <sup>7458 </sup> <n>nor famine</n> ל֥וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and we will not</n> נִרְאֶֽה׃ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>upon us neither shall we see</n>
